00060 bool tgf::IsOdd( int number )
00061 {
00062         bool answer = number & 1;
00063         return answer;
00064 }
00065 
00066 bool tgf::Quadratic( double A, double B, double C, double *t0, double *t1)
00067 {
00068         // Find discriminant
00069         double discrim = B*B - 4.0*A*C;
00070         if (discrim < 0.) return false;
00071 
00072         // Compute quadratic root values
00073         double q = -0.5;
00074         if ( B < 0 ) q *= B - sqrt( discrim );
00075         else q *= B + sqrt( discrim ) ;
00076         *t0 = q / A;
00077         *t1 = C / q;
00078         if(*t0 > *t1) std::swap( *t0, *t1 );
00079         return true;
00080 }
00081 
00082 double tgf::AlternateBoxMuller( RandomDeviate& rand )
00083 {
00084         static bool firsttime = true;
00085         static double x1;
00086         static double x2;
00087 
00088         if (firsttime)
00089         {
00090                 double s = 2;
00091                 double u1;
00092                 double u2;
00093                 while(s > 1)
00094                 {
00095                         u1 = 2 * rand.RandomDouble( ) - 1;
00096                         u2 = 2 * rand.RandomDouble( ) - 1;
00097                         s = u1 * u1 + u2 * u2;
00098                 }
00099 
00100                 double z = sqrt( -2 * log( s ) / s );
00101                 x1 = z * u1;
00102                 x2 = z * u2;
00103 
00104                 firsttime = false;
00105                 return x1;
00106         }
00107         else
00108         {
00109                 firsttime = true;
00110                 return x2;
00111         }
00112 
00113 
00114 }

00116 SbMatrix tgf::MatrixFromTransform( const Transform& transform )
00117 {
00118         Ptr<Matrix4x4> transformMatrix = transform.GetMatrix()->Transpose();
00119         float m00 = float ( transformMatrix->m[0][0] );
00120         float m01 = float ( transformMatrix->m[0][1] );
00121         float m02 = float ( transformMatrix->m[0][2] );
00122         float m03 = float ( transformMatrix->m[0][3] );
00123         float m10 = float ( transformMatrix->m[1][0] );
00124         float m11 = float ( transformMatrix->m[1][1] );
00125         float m12 = float ( transformMatrix->m[1][2] );
00126         float m13 = float ( transformMatrix->m[1][3] );
00127         float m20 = float ( transformMatrix->m[2][0] );
00128         float m21 = float ( transformMatrix->m[2][1] );
00129         float m22 = float ( transformMatrix->m[2][2] );
00130         float m23 = float ( transformMatrix->m[2][3] );
00131         float m30 = float ( transformMatrix->m[3][0] );
00132         float m31 = float ( transformMatrix->m[3][1] );
00133         float m32 = float ( transformMatrix->m[3][2] );
00134         float m33 = float ( transformMatrix->m[3][3] );
00135 
00136         SbVec3f axis1( m00, m10, m20 );
00137         SbVec3f axis2( m01, m11, m21 );
00138         //axis2.normalize();
00139 
00140         SbVec3f axis3( m02, m12, m22 );
00141         //axis3.normalize();
00142 
00143         return SbMatrix( axis1[0], axis2[0], axis3[0], m03,
00144                         axis1[1], axis2[1], axis3[1], m13,
00145                         axis1[2], axis2[2], axis3[2], m23,
00146                         m30, m31, m32, m33 );
00147 
00148 }

00150 Transform tgf::TransformFromMatrix( SbMatrix const& matrix )
00151 {
00152         Transform transform;
00153         /*if( matrix.det4() < tgc::Epsilon )
00154                 transform = Transform( new Matrix4x4(), new Matrix4x4() );
00155         else*/
00156                 transform = Transform( matrix[0][0], matrix[1][0], matrix[2][0], matrix[3][0],
00157                                                          matrix[0][1], matrix[1][1], matrix[2][1], matrix[3][1],
00158                                                          matrix[0][2], matrix[1][2], matrix[2][2], matrix[3][2],
00159                                                          matrix[0][3], matrix[1][3], matrix[2][3], matrix[3][3] );
00160 
00161         return transform;
00162 }
00163 
00164 Transform tgf::TransformFromSoTransform( SoTransform* const & soTransform )
00165 {
00166         return TransformFromMatrix( MatrixFromSoTransform( soTransform ) );
00167 }
00168 
00169 SbMatrix tgf::MatrixFromSoTransform( SoTransform* const & soTransform )
00170 {
00171         SbMatrix sbMatrix;
00172         sbMatrix.setTransform(  soTransform->translation.getValue(),
00173                                                         soTransform->rotation.getValue(),
00174                                                     soTransform->scaleFactor.getValue(),
00175                                                     soTransform->scaleOrientation.getValue(),
00176                                                     soTransform->center.getValue() );
00177 
00178         return sbMatrix;
00179 
00180 }
